description: Identify students at risk of dropping out early
use_case: Provide early intervention to keep students in school
target_description: 1 = At risk of dropout, 0 = On track

recommendations.action_negative: Urgent: Assign counselor, contact parents, provide tutoring

sample_inputs.name: High-risk student
sample_inputs.description: Low attendance, poor grades, limited parent involvement

sample_inputs.name: Thriving student
sample_inputs.description: Good attendance, strong GPA, active in extracurriculars
